posts.post_content:
SOLD (shipped) for the trio.  Standard paypal preferred.  Backs are problem-free.  

Birmingham:  light diagonal wrinkle/crease through torso (visible in scan), another one basically parallel, starting near the 'v' in Cleveland (not all that visible in the scan) 

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfolderssv/srs1a/mycards/websize/birmingham.jpg[/IMG]

Murphy:  very light wrinkle to the left of his cap (tough to see even with the card in hand)

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfolderssv/srs1a/mycards/websize/murphy.jpg[/IMG]

Powell:  light vertical crease running through his glove and bare hand, light corner creases on both L corners

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfolderssv/srs1a/mycards/websize/powell.jpg[/IMG]
